meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Clarke Kerri McCoy Mark Japinga Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6653.

td.p: John Clarke, a management consultant originally from Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
Kerri McCoy, a pediatric emergency-room nurse from Jersey City, New Jersey
Mark Japinga, a legislative researcher from Washington, D.C. (whose 4-day cash winnings total $112,600)

tr.td: HEALTHY CHOICE
ONE-WORD SHOUT OUTS
THE OSCAR FOR BEST ANIMATED FEATURE
CONSTRUCTION
AUTHOR-IZED BIOGRAPHIES
(Jimmy: The famous water puppets of Vietnam, a classic art form of Asian magic and myth.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In an equal serving of roasted duck, turkey or goose, the one with the fewest calories')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In an equal serving of roasted duck, turkey or goose, the one with the fewest calories

(Kerri: What is ice cream?)
(John: What is [*]?)
(Alex: You got it.)
[Laughter]

dried figs

MarkKerriJohn
')

Kerri
John

MAKE ROOM FOR ROONEY
METALS
U.S. RIVERS
THE LAST "OUT"
(Alex: Each correct response will end with those three letters of the alphabet.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
